sentences.sContent: I am extremely interested in investment banking and would love nothing more than to learn under your tutelage.
sentences.sContent_eng: I am extremely interested in investment banking and would love nothing more than to learn under your tutelage.
sentences.sCn: 我异常地向往在顶级投行工作的机会，我唯一的要求就是能够在您的指导下学习更多的东西。

sentences.sContent: He made good progress under her tutelage.
sentences.sContent_eng: He made good progress under her tutelage.
sentences.sCn: 他在她的教导下进步很大。

remMethod.val: tut (教导； 监督) + el + age → 指导

words.tran: 辅导的；家庭教师的，个别指导的
当家庭教师；（美）在家庭教师指导下学习

trans.tranOther: when you are taught or looked after by someone
